data.oai_dc:dc: Length and width measurements and hemispherical cylinder volume calculations of Rhagoletis fly pupae. These measurements represent field collected populations of apple-, blueberry-, and hawthorn-associated Rhagoletis fly pupae. We photographed the pupae and then processed all images with ImageJ to measure the pupae length and width. These measurements were used to calculate a hemispherical cylinder volume of each pupae.
